    • Method Detail

      • initializeProject

        protected java.io.File initializeProject(org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext context,
                                         Options options,
                                         java.util.Properties props)
        The intended use case is that an installer command can be run from any directory, which means we need to first initialize a DHF project (specifically, generating the gradle.properties file) and then refresh HubConfig based on those properties and anything a client passed in via JVM props. This allows for all of the DHF properties to be read in and used for connecting to a DHF instance.
        Parameters:
        options -

      • verifyUserCanAuthenticate

        protected void verifyUserCanAuthenticate()
